title: Khan Academy
description: Offers free, high-quality lessons in various subjects, including math, science, and SAT prep. The platform provides interactive exercises and video tutorials.

title: Coursera
description: Provides access to college-level courses from universities worldwide. Great for advanced learners looking to dive deeper into subjects like computer science or calculus.

title: edX
description: Features free courses from top universities on topics ranging from AP courses to niche fields like environmental science or robotics.

title: Quizlet
description: A versatile tool for creating and studying flashcards. It's especially useful for memorization-heavy subjects like biology or history.

title: Chegg Tutors
description: Connects students with online tutors for personalized help. Chegg is ideal for homework assistance and test preparation.

title: Study.com
description: Offers engaging video lessons and quizzes on high school and college-level subjects. The platform is designed for quick learning and review.

title: Brilliant
description: Focused on STEM topics, it uses problem-solving and interactive exercises to teach concepts in an engaging manner.

title: Wyzant
description: A marketplace for finding in-person or online tutors for one-on-one lessons tailored to the student's needs.

title: TutorMe
description: Provides instant online tutoring across many subjects with 24/7 availability. Their rigorous vetting process ensures high-quality tutors.

title: Skooli
description: An online tutoring service with a pay-as-you-go model, covering a range of high school subjects, including math, physics, and English.

title: Photomath
description: Solves math problems using a phone camera while providing step-by-step solutions. Great for independent learners needing immediate feedback.

title: Brainly
description: A collaborative learning app where students can ask and answer questions. It encourages peer-to-peer learning.

title: Socratic by Google
description: Uses AI to break down and explain questions in subjects like math, science, and literature. A helpful tool for quick concept clarification.

title: Duolingo
description: Ideal for language learners, offering gamified lessons in various languages. Its bite-sized approach makes learning consistent and fun.

title: Sylvan Learning Center
description: Provides personalized tutoring plans and small-group instruction. Known for its structured programs in core academic areas.

title: Kumon
description: Focused on math and reading, Kumon emphasizes self-paced learning and building foundational skills.

title: Huntington Learning Center
description: Specializes in academic skill-building and test preparation, with tailored learning plans for each student.

title: Mathnasium
description: Designed to help students excel in math through customized lesson plans and one-on-one instruction.

title: National Honor Society
description: Many NHS chapters offer free tutoring services run by high-achieving students, often at the high school itself.

title: School-Based Tutoring Programs
description: Many schools have teacher-led or peer-tutoring initiatives for extra support in core subjects.

title: Boys & Girls Clubs of America
description: Offers free or low-cost tutoring and homework help at local centers, with a focus on accessibility and community support.

title: Libraries
description: Many public libraries host free tutoring programs or connect students with volunteer tutors.
